About

My name is Jan Friebe, a German based and trained IT specialist in application development and an graphic assitent in print and digital. My passion in software development lies between functionality and good, aesthetic designs. I take care in the experience and a maintainable code quality of products.

I am also an ambitious, willing to learn and passionate dude with fun and interest in new technologies especially in frontend related topics.
